handist.collections.dist

Class TeamedPlaceGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.dist.TeamedPlaceGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    apgas.util.SerializableWithReplace, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SinglePlaceGroup

    public class TeamedPlaceGroup
extends Object
implements apgas.util.SerializableWithReplace
    Represents a group of hosts and provides communication facilities between hosts.

    There is always one TeamedPlaceGroup initialized which contains all the hosts involved in the computation. This instance can be obtained with method getWorld().

    When creating distributed collections, the hosts that will handle the collections need to be specified with a TeamedPlaceGroup instance. Such distributed collections can either operate with all the hosts involved in the computation by using the the TeamedPlaceGroup returned by getWorld(), or with a subset of the hosts gathered in a new TeamedPlaceGroup instance.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        @Deprecated
public mpi.Intracomm comm
        Deprecated. 
        Direct access to MPI functions is absolutely discouraged. This member will be made private with intermediate access in the future.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TeamedPlaceGroup

        protected TeamedPlaceGroup()
        Proctected constructor used by class SinglePlaceGroup exclusively

        This constructor initializes the members of TeamedPlaceGroup such that a single place (the place on which this method is called) is contained in the group.

      • TeamedPlaceGroup

        protected TeamedPlaceGroup(apgas.util.GlobalID id,
                           int myrank,
                           int size,
                           int[] rank2place)
        Constructor that builds a TeamedPlaceGroup instance which contains all the hosts that participate in the computation
        Parameters:
        id - a global id for this handle
        myrank - the rank of this host in the world
        size - number of hosts in the world
        rank2place - correspondance array between Place number and MPI rank

      • TeamedPlaceGroup

      • getWorld

        public static TeamedPlaceGroup getWorld()

      • setup

        public static void setup()
        Method that needs to be called on every host participating in the computation before the MPILauncher is started. This method registers a "plugin" with MPILauncher.registerPlugin(Plugin) which handles specific setup needed by the distributed collection library.

      • bCast1

        public boolean bCast1(boolean val,
                      apgas.Place root)
        Broadcast one boolean value from the root place to all processes of the group.
        Parameters:
        val - sent value from the root place. In other places, the value will be ignored.
        root - broadcast a value from the place.
        Returns:
        If the root place, return val and if other places, return recieved value.

      • gather1

        public boolean[] gather1(boolean val,
                         apgas.Place root)
        Gathers one boolean variable from all places, wrapping MPI#gather.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to gather.
        root - gather values from all places to the root.
        Returns:
        If at the root place, return an array storing gathered values to. At other places, return null.

        public int rank()
        Returns the MPI rank of the calling host in the current TeamedPlaceGroup.
        Returns:

      • rank

        public int rank(apgas.Place place)
        Returns the MPI rank of the specified place in the current TeamedPlaceGroup. If the specified place is not a member of this TeamedPlaceGroup, throws a RuntimeException.
        Parameters:
        place - place whose rank is to be returned
        Returns:
        rank of this host within the TeamedPlaceGroup
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the specified place is not a member of this group

      • reduce1

        public boolean reduce1(boolean val,
                       mpi.Op op,
                       apgas.Place root)
        Combine one int value of each process using the reduce operation, and return the combined value of the root process.
        Parameters:
        val - send value.
        op - reduce operation.
        root - combined value is returned only the root place.
        Returns:
        at root place, the combined value. at other places, return val as it is.
